participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Down-to-earth and hardworking, Jake loves the simple life of farming and enjoys the tranquility of the countryside.
participant_1.background: i've a pet cow. i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i work my parents farms.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Creative and ambitious, Margaret has a rich history as an artist but now navigates the challenges of her current life with humor and a bit of nostalgia.
participant_2.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper.

content.text: no i work with my parents on the farm
